text: Mincu avara drstigalannu kittukolluvudo embantide. Adu avara munde belagidagalella avaru adaralli (a belakinalli) nadeyatodaguttare. Matte avara mele kattalu kavidaga avaru nintu biduttare. Allahanu bayasiddare, avara keluva mattu noduva samarthyavannu kittukolluttiddanu. Allahanu khandita ellavannu madaballavanagiddane
